OCaml - Exam questions, 2017

  • Note that this year's exam is expected to be a bit more difficult.
  • First assessment:
    • enonce1.txt
    • types_vehicle.ml
    • answers1.ml
    If you wish to try by yourself on INSA computers, you will need to download these files: qqs1.ml and exam1.ml.
  • Second assessment:
    • enonce2.txt
    • types_vehicle.ml
    • answers2.ml
    On INSA computers, you will need qqs2.ml and exam2.ml.
Note: there exist many solutions to each question.
